title: Trump Cabinet picks: RFK Jr. tapped for Health secretary
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump named Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to be his next Secretary of Health and Human Services, among other picks on Thursday.

title: Donald Trump picks former Rep. Doug Collins for secretary of veterans affairs
shortDescription: Former Georgia U.S. Rep. Doug Collins is Donald Trump's pick to run the Department of Veterans Affairs.

title: Argentina no celebró el triunfo de Trump con fuegos artificiales | Hechos
shortDescription: El video que circuló en redes sociales fue grabado en 2019 durante la toma de posesión del expresidente Alberto Fernández.

title: No, estas imágenes no son de viajeros que huyen de Trump | Hechos
shortDescription: Las fotografías fueron tomadas en julio de 2024 durante una interrupción masiva de sistemas informáticos a nivel mundial.

title: Trump Cabinet picks test House Republicans' narrow majority
shortDescription: House Republicans will have a small margin in the chamber next year. Speaker Mike Johnson has warned Trump, who is still pulling from the GOP's ranks.

title: Republicans win control of House and Senate in Congress sweep
shortDescription: Plus, Sen. John Thune will be the next Senate majority leader, while President-elect Donald Trump continues to build his next staff.

title: Trump picks his lawyer, Todd Blanche, as deputy attorney general
shortDescription: Todd Blanche, designated for the No. 2 slot the Justice Department, represented Trump in his New York hush money trial and two federal criminal cases.

title: Trump picks former SEC chair Jay Clayton for powerful U.S. attorney role
shortDescription: If confirmed by the Senate, Clayton would lead one of the most important federal prosecutor offices in the country.

title: Teacher resigns after video threatening Trump voters circulates online
shortDescription: A video circulating online shows the teacher making threats against Trump voters.

title: Trump tests Republican senators with controversial cabinet picks
shortDescription: Matt Gaetz for attorney general? Senate Republicans say it is an uphill battle for confirmation.

title: Who is RFK Jr., Trump's pick to oversee health agencies?
shortDescription: Trump chose Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to run Health and Human Services Department, which oversees NIH, CDC and FDA, among other agencies.

title: Why does Trump want recess appointments? 5 things to know
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump wants the Senate to bypass approval for his Cabinet choices. How is that possible? We'll explain.

title: No, satellite was not destroyed to hide election rigging | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no evidence the election was rigged or that the destruction of a SpaceX satellite was part of a cover-up.

title: Tight race for Senate in PA headed to recount
shortDescription: Pennsylvania will recount the race between incumbent Democratic Sen. Bob Casey and Republican David McCormick, who leads by 28,000 votes.

title: No, Trump didn't pick Amber Rose as education secretary | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no credible evidence to support the claim. A purported statement about Rose does not appear on any of Trump's social media accounts.

title: Matt Gaetz resigns from Congress
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's nominee for attorney general, Matt Gaetz, was under criminal investigation before he resigned from Congress.

title: Majority in national popular vote chose Trump | Fact check
shortDescription: Trump received 75.9 million votes as of Nov. 14. That's more than the total for Harris and all third-party candidates combined.

title: Trump expected to meet Argentine President Milei at Mar-a-Lago
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump is expected to meet with Argentine President Javier Milei while the leader attends a conference at Mar-a-Lago.

title: Is Matt Gaetz a lawyer? More about Trump's attorney general pick
shortDescription: Donald Trump named Matt Gaetz as his attorney general pick. Here's what to know about his prior experience.

title: Why Howard Lutnick, Trump's transition co-chair, has a big job
shortDescription: Executing a successful presidential transition requires serious planning, said Max Stier, president and CEO of the Partnership for Public Service.

title: Trump considering ban on vaccines, fluoride in second term
shortDescription: Former President Donald Trump stated in a recent interview that he expects Robert F. Kennedy to have a “big role” in a second administration, specifically in the public health sector.
